item.title: User's Manual P1
item.description:
MSC Nastran 2024.1 DEMATD GuideMSC Nastran DEMATD Guide

Worldwide Web www.hexagon.com Support https://simcompanion.hexagon.com Disclaimer Hexagon reserves the right to make changes in specifications and other information contained in this document without prior notice. The concepts, methods, and examples presented in this text are for illustrative and educational purposes only, and are not intended to be exhaustive or to apply to any particular engineering problem or design. Hexagon assumes no liability or responsibility to any person or company for direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of any information contained herein. User Documentation: Copyright 2024 Hexagon AB and/or its subsidiaries. All Rights Reserved. This notice shall be marked on any reproduction of this documentation, in whole or in part. Any reproduction or distribution of this document, in whole or in part, without the prior written consent of Hexagon is prohibited. This software may contain certain third-party software that is protected by copyright and licensed from Hexagon suppliers. Additional terms and conditions and/or notices may apply for certain third party software. Such additional third party software terms and conditions and/or notices may be set forth in documentation and/or at third-party software information (or successor website designated by Hexagon from time to time). PCGLSS 8.0, Copyright © 1992-2016, Computational Applications and System Integration Inc. All rights reserved. PCGLSS 8.0 is licensed from Computational Applications and System Integration Inc. The Hexagon logo, Hexagon, MSC Software logo, MSC, Dytran, Marc, MSC Nastran, Patran, e -Xstream, Digimat, and Simulating Reality are trademarks or registered trademarks of Hexagon AB and/or its subsidiaries in the United States and/or other countries. NASTRAN is a registered trademark of NASA. FLEXlm and FlexNet Publisher are trademarks or registered trademarks of Flexera Software. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Use, duplicate, or disclosure by the U.S. Government is subjected to restrictions as set forth in FAR 12.212 (Commercial Computer Software) and DFARS 227.7202 (Commercial Computer Software and Commercial Computer Software Documentation), as applicable. U.S. Patent 9,361,413 May 16, 2024 NA:V2024.1:Z:Z:Z:DC-DEMATD-PDFCorporate Office Hexagon Manufacturing Intelligence, Inc. UK 78 Portsmouth Road Cedar House Cobham, Surrey KT11 1HY Telephone: (+44) 02070686555

Documentation Feedback At Hexagon Manufacturing Intelligence, we strive to produce the highest quality documentation and welcome your feedback. If you have comments or suggestions about our documentation, write to us . Please include the following information with your feedback: Document name Release/Version number Chapter/Section name Topic title (for Online Help) Brief description of the content (for example, incomplete/incorrect information, grammatical errors, information that requires clarification or more details and so on). Your suggestions for correcting/improving documentation Note: The above mentioned e-mail address is only for providing documentation specific feedback. If you have any technical problems, issues, or queries, please contact Technical Support .

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 12 MATD024/MATD112/MATD114 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 13 MATD025 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 14 MATD026 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 21 MATD064 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 22 MATD77O . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 23

Main Index

1 Introduction Main Index Introduction Since Nastran 2017.1, there was a change in MSC Nastran Explicit Nonlinear (SOL 700) solution sequence. The underlying structural solver was changed from LS-Dyna to Dytran. This caused a variation in the support of data cards, especially materials, that can be used. A translator was created to facilitate the conversion of old input files. This translator converts materials where possible, from SOL 700 VERSION=ORIGINAL to SOL 700 VERSION=PRIMARY. The current release of MSC Nastran does not support the SOL 700 MATDxxx bulk data entries anymore, with the exception of MATDEUL. The DEMATD utility translates them into supported material entries, or prints warnings if one to one translation is not possible. It will automatically process all files that are referenced by an INCLUDE directive as well, including nested files. Usage DEMATD has to be executed from the command line. For example, if the SOL 700 input deck is called original.dat that contains the line model.bdf , the command to run DEMATD is : dematd original.dat This will create the files DEMATD_original.dat and DEMATD_model.bdf The default prefix DEMATD_ can also be changed to suit the requirement of the user. For example, If you use the command dematd original.dat userpref_ it will replace DEMATD with userpref and create the files userpref_original.dat and userpref_model.bdfNote: The intent of the DEMATD tool is to help the conversion of material entries in the old input deck. Manual conversion of other entries are required for all other features (such as certain PARAMeters and Output Requests) that are not compatible.

MSC Nastran DEMATD Guide2 Main Index List of materials that cannot be translated The database of materials available in the MSC Nastran SOL 700 VERSION=ORIGINAL (LS-Dyna version) is larger than the materials that are available in MSC Nastran SOL 700 VERSION=PRIMARY (Dytran version). Therefore there will be a set of materials that cannot be converted at all. The list of materials that cannot be converted is as follows: Table 0-1 Unsupported Material Cards MATD004 MATD040 MATD007 MATD053 MATD009 MATD057 MATD010 MATD058 MATD016 MATD062 MATD018 MATD065 MATD019 MATD066-MATD77H MATD021 MATD078-MATD111 MATD029 MATD115 MATD030 MATD119-MATD272 MATD031 MATDB01 MATD032 MATDERO MATD034 MATDIGI MATD036 MATDMG MATD037 MATDTxx MATD038 MATDSWx MATD039 MATDSxx Note: MATD009: Leave warning. “If MATD009 is used for the definition of coupling surfaces, use PSHELL1 with OPTION=DUMMY instead of MATD009.” MATD034: It is fabric material and the usage is identical as MATFAB. However, the options are quite different between two materials. So it is not available to be translated into MATFAB. MATD036: Not supported. It is similar to SHEETMAT in Dytran but Nastran does not have the SHEETMAT material. MATD065: Although MATD065 will be translated to MAT1+MATEP with ZAMODEL, the results will not be the same because of small differences in theoretical implementation .

3 DEMATD translations of supported materials Main Index DEMATD translations of supported materials This section describes the comparison of translated entries to the original entries. It also describes the options available compared to the old entry. MATD001 Options MATD2AN Options epsilon_3, gamma_13, and gamma_23 do not exist in shells. 1->1, 2->2, 3-> not supported, 4->3, 5->not supported and 6-> not supported. Old New MATD001 MAT1 RO RHO E E PR NU DA Not Supported DB Not Supported K Not Supported Option Not Supported VC Not Supported CP Not Supported Old (Available in shell and solid) New (Only available in shell) MATD2AN MAT2 RO RHO C11 G11 C12 G12 C22 G22

MSC Nastran DEMATD Guide4 Main Index MATD2OR (shell)/MATD116(shell) MATD2OR (solid)

  1. MATD2OR > MAT8 Options EC, PRCA and PRCB do not exist in shells.C13 Not Supported C23 Not Supported C33 Not Supported C14 G13 C24 G23 C34 Not Supported C44 G33 C15C66 Not Supported AOPT Only 0 is available XPBETA Not Supported Old (Available in shell and solid) New MATD2OR (shell)/MATD116(shell) MAT8 (shell) MATD2OR (solid) MATORT (solid) RO RHO EA E1 EB E2 EC Not supported PRBA N12=EA*PRBA/EB PRCA Not supported PRCB Not supported GAB G12 GBC G2,Z

5 DEMATD translations of supported materials Main Index 2. MATD2OR > MATORT OptionsGCA G1,Z AOPT Only 0 is available G (not available in MATD116) Not supported SIGF (not available in MATD116) Not supported XPBETA Not supported RO RHO EA E1 EB E2 EC E3 PRBA N12=EAPRBA/EB PRCA N31 PRCB N23=EBPRCB/EC GAB G12 GBC G23 GCA G31 AOPT OPTION 0 = ELEM 2 = VECT Others are not available G Not supported SIGF Not supported XPZP Not supported A1A3 X1Z1 V1V3 Not supported D1D3 X2~Z2 BETA Not supported

MSC Nastran DEMATD Guide6 Main Index MATD003 Options MATD005/MATD014 Options Check the table in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shear_modulus.. The relationship to extract E and v using G and K.Old New MATD003 MAT1+MATEP+MATF RO RHO (MAT1) E E (MAT1) PR NU (MAT1) FORM=SLOPE (default) (MATEP) SIGY Y0 (MATEP) ETAN H (MATEP) BETA Only 0 is available RYIELD=VMISES (default) (MATEP) Option=Reffect SRC C SRP P Criterion=103 (MATF) FS MPS (MATF) VP Only 0 is available Old New MATD005/MATD014 MAT1+MATEP

7 DEMATD translations of supported materials Main Index Change EPS1P10 in TABLED1. It is used in TABLE in MATEP. MATD006 Options Check the table in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shear_modulus. Only bulk modulus is used. So any values of E an PR combination is possible to get the same value of BULK modulus. For example, K=1.0. Then set NU=0.2 and calculate E=3K(1-2*NU) Change EPS1P10 in TABLED1. It is used in TABLE in MATEP.RO RHO (MAT1) G E=9KG/(3K+G) (MAT1) K (MATD005)/ BULK (MATD014) NU=(3K-2G)/(2(3*K+G)) (MAT1) RYIELD=SOIL (MATEP) Option=SOIL CUTOFF=2.0 (default) YIELD=1.0 (default) YSTYP=1.0(default) TYPE=2.0 (This value is not default) A0,A1,A2 A0,A1,A2 (MATEP) PC VALUE (MATEP) EPS1EPS10 X values in TABLE (MATEP) P1P10 Y values in TABLE (MATEP) Old New MATD006 MAT1+MATVE

MSC Nastran DEMATD Guide8 Main Index MATD012 Options Check the table in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shear_modulus. The relationship to extract E and v using G and K. Change EPS1~P10 in TABLED1. It is used in TABLE in MATEP. RO RHO (MAT1) BULK E and NU (MAT1) MODEL= ISOLIN (MATVE) G0 G0 (MATVE) GI GI (MATVE) BETAS BETA (MATVE) Old New MATD012 MAT1+MATEP RO RHO (MAT1) G E=9KG/(3K+G) (MAT1) BULK NU=(3K-2G)/(2(3*K+G)) (MAT1) FORM=SLOPE (default) (MATEP) RYIELD=VMISES (default) (MATEP) SIGY Y0 (MATEP) ETAN H (MATEP)

9 DEMATD translations of supported materials Main Index MATD013 Options Check the table in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shear_modulus. The relationship to extract E and v using G and K. Change EPS1~P10 in TABLED1. It is used in TABLE in MATEP. MATD015 Options Check the table in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shear_modulus. For example, G=1.0. Then set NU=0.2 and calculate E=2G(1+NU)Old New MATD013 MAT1+MATEP+MATF RO RHO (MAT1) G E=9KG/(3K+G) (MAT1) BULK NU=(3K-2G)/(2(3*K+G)) (MAT1) FORM=SLOPE (default) (MATEP) RYIELD=VMISES (default) (MATEP) SIGY Y0 (MATEP) ETAN H (MATEP) REM Only 0.0 is available When EPF is set and PRF is not set: Criterion=103 (MATF) EPF MPS (MATF) TREM DT (MATF) When PRF is set and EPF/DT are not set Criterion=104 (MATF) PRF PRS Old (available in shells and solids) New (available only in solids) MATD015 MAT1+MATEP+MATF

MSC Nastran DEMATD Guide 10 Main Index Change EPS1~P10 in TABLED1. It is used in TABLE in MATEP. RO RHO (MAT1) G Only G is available in MATD015. If only G is defined, it is translated into E and NU. (MAT1) E E (MAT1) PR NU (MAT1) DTF Not supported VP Only 0 is available RATEOP Only 0 is available RYIELD=JHCOOK (MATEP) Option=Jhcook (MATEP) A A B B N N C C M M TM TMELT TR TROOM EPSO 0DOT CP CP PC Not supported SPALL Not supported C2P Not supported Criterion=102 (MATF) IT MTH 0 -> DISC 1 -> CONT D1-D5 D1-D5 EPSO 0DOT

11 DEMATD translations of supported materials Main Index MATD020 Options MATD20M Example: MATD20M,1,2,3,4,5,6,7 -> DYPARAM,MATRMRG1,MR1,MR2,MR3,MR4,MR5,MR6,MR7TM TMELT TR TROOM CP CP Old New MATD020 MATRIG RO RHO E E PR NU CMO Only 0 is available CON1 Only 0 is available CON2 Only 0 is available A1(LCO)~V3 Not supported Old New MATD20M PARAM,MATRMRG1

MSC Nastran DEMATD Guide 12 Main Index MATD022 Options EC, PRCA and PRCB don’t exist in shells.Old (available in shell and solid) New (only available in shell) MATD022 MAT8+MAT8A RO RHO (MAT8) EA E1 (MAT8) EB E2 (MAT8) EC Not supported PRBA N12=EA*PRBA/EB (MAT8) PRCA Not supported PRCB Not supported GAB G12 (MAT8) GBC G1,Z (MAT8) GCA G2,Z (MAT8) AOPT Only 0 is available MACFBETA Not supported Not supported SNSZX Not supported FT=CHANG (MAT8A) SC S XT XT YT YT YC YC ALPH ALPHA

13 DEMATD translations of supported materials Main Index MATD024/MATD112/MATD114 Options The combination of SIGY and ETAN -> FORM (MATEP) = SLOPE TIDSS -> FORM (MATEP) = TABLE Only one of above two options are available (If both are given, print warning: Select TIDSS and ignore SIGY and ETAN.) When both of the combination of C and P and TIDSR are given, print warning: Select TIDSR and ignore C and P If EPS1ES8 are given, take one of actions below •Give an error: Use TIDSS instead of EPS1ES8. •Change the values to new TABLED1 and put RTID=new TABLED1 id. •If the both of EPS1ES8 and TIDSS are given, print warning: Select TIDSS.Old New MATD024/MATD112/MATD114 MAT1+MATEP+MATF RO RHO (MAT1) E E (MAT1) PR NU (MAT1) SIGY Y0 (MATEP), FORM=SLOPE (default) (MATEP) ETAN H (MATEP), FORM=SLOPE (default) (MATEP) TIDSS FID (MATEP), FORM=TABLE (MATEP) RYIELD = VMISES (default) (MATEP) Option = Reffect C C P P TIDSR RTID Criterion=103 (MATF) FAIL (not available in MATD112) MPS (MATF) TDEL (not available in MATD112) DT (MATF) VP (not available in MATD112/MATD114) Only 0 is available EPS1EPS8 It is identical of x values in TIDSS ES1~ES8 It is identical of y values in TIDSS

MSC Nastran DEMATD Guide 14 Main Index MATD025 Options Check the table in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shear_modulus.Old New MATD025 MAT1+MATF RHO RHO (MAT1) BULK E=9BULKG/(3BULK+G) (MAT1) G NU=(3K-2G)/(2(3*K+G)) (MAT1) Criterion=105 (MATF) ALPHA ALPHA (MATF) THETA THETA (MATF) GAMMA GAMMA (MATF) BETA BETA (MATF) R R (MATF) D D (MATF) W W (MATF) X0 X0 (MATF) C CBAR (MATF) N N (MATF) PLOT Not supported FTYPE TYPE (MATF) 1 = SOIL 2 = ROCK VEC ITER (MATF) 0 = VEC 1 = FULL TOFF TOFF (MATF)

item.title: User's Manual P2
item.description:
15 DEMATD translations of supported materials Main Index MATD026 Options LS/Dyna material does not have the option as TYPE in MATEP. Instead of TYPE, if the x value of table, LCALCCA , starts from negative value or zero, it is the same as TYPE=RELVOL in MATEP. If it starts from positive value, it is the same as TYPE=CRUSH.Old New MATD026 MATORT+MATEP RO RHO (MATORT) EAAU E1 (MATORT) EBBU E2 (MATORT) ECCU E3 (MATORT) GABU G12 (MATORT) GBCU G23 (MATORT) GCAU G31 (MATORT) AOPT OPTION (MATORT) 0 -> ELEM 2 -> VECT Others are not available XPZP Not supported A1A3 X1Z1 (MATORT) V1V3 Not supported D1D3 X2~Z2 (MATORT) TSEF Not supported SSEF Not supported RYIELD= ORTHOCR (MATEP) Option= OrthoCr TYPE=CRUSH or RELVOL depending on the start value of TABLED1’s E E (MATEP) PR NU (MATEP)

MSC Nastran DEMATD Guide 16 Main Index SIGY Y0 (MATEP) VF RELV (MATEP) MU Not supported BULK Not supported LCA TIDXX (MATEP) LCB TIDYY (MATEP) IF LCB=0, TIDYY=LCA LCC TIDZZ (MATEP) IF LCC=0, TIDYY=LCA LCS If LCS=0, LCS=LCA It is not used directly, but it can be used for TIDXY~TIDXZ LCAB TIDXY (MATEP) If LCAB=0, TIDXY=LCS LCBC TIDYZ (MATEP) If LCBC=0, TIDYZ=LCS LCCA TIDZX (MATEP) If LCCA=0, TIDZX=LCS LCSR TIDSR (MATEP)

17 DEMATD translations of supported materials Main Index MATD027 Options MATD028 Options Old New MATD027 MATHE MODEL=MOONEY1 RO RHO PR NU A A B B SGL~TID Not supported Old New MATD028 MAT1+MATEP RO RHO (MAT1) E E (MAT1) PR NU (MAT1) FORM=SLOPE (default) (MATEP) SIGY Y0 (MATEP) ETAN H (MATEP)

MSC Nastran DEMATD Guide 18 Main Index MATD054 Options Old (shell and solid) New (Only for shell) MATD054 MAT8+MAT8A RO RHO (MAT8) EA E1 (MAT8) EB E2 (MAT8) EC Not supported PRBA N12=EA*PRBA/EB PRCA Not supported PRCB Not supported GAB G12 GBC G2,Z GCA G1,Z KF Not supported AOPT Only 0 is available A1~D3 Not supported DFAILM Not supported DFAILS Not supported TFAIL Not supported MAT8A TRSFAIL=SUBL ALPH ALPHA (MAT8A) SOFT Not supported FBRT Not supported YCFAC Not supported DFAILT Not supported DFAILC Not supported EFS Not supported XC XC (MAT8A) XT XT (MAT8A)

19 DEMATD translations of supported materials Main Index YC YC (MAT8A) YT YT (MAT8A) SC S (MAT8A) CRIT MAT8A FT = CHANG for CRIT=54 FT = MODTSAI for CRIT=55 BETA Not supported PFL Not supported EPSF Not supported EPSR Not supported TSMD Not supported SOFT2 Not supported SLIMT1 Not supported SLIMC1 Not supported SLIMT2 Not supported SLIMC2 Not supported SLIMS Not supported NCYRED PFD = STEPS (MAT8A) VALUE=NCYRED (MAT8A) SOFTG Not supported

MSC Nastran DEMATD Guide 20 Main Index MATD059 Options Old (shell and solid) New (Only for shell) MATD059 MAT8+MAT8A RO RHO (MAT8) EA E1 (MAT8) EB E2 (MAT8) EC Not supported PRBA N12=EA*PRBA/EB PRCA Not supported Option Only “SHELL” is available PRCB Not supported GAB G12 GBC G2,Z GCA G1,Z KF Not supported AOPT Only 0 is available MAFLAG Not supported XP~BETA Not supported TSIZE Not supported MAT8A FT = HASHIN ALP ALPHA (MAT8A) SOFT Not supported FBRT Not supported SR Not supported SF Not supported XC XC (MAT8A) XT XT (MAT8A)

21 DEMATD translations of supported materials Main Index MATD063 Options Check the table in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shear_modulus.YC YC (MAT8A) YT YT (MAT8A) SC S (MAT8A) Old New
MATD063 MATHE Model=FOAM1 TYPE=STRAIN CUTOFF=SFRAC RO RHO E K=E/(3*(1-2*PR)) PR TID TABLE TSC VALUE=-TSC Be careful that TSC is positive in tension but VALUE is negative in tension. DAMP Not supported

MSC Nastran DEMATD Guide 22 Main Index MATD064 Options Old New
MATD064 MAT1+MATEP RO RHO (MAT1) E E (MAT1) PR NU (MAT1) In MATEP: RYIELD= RPWRLAW Option= PwrLaw B=0.0 C=0.0 K A (MATEP) M M (MATEP) N N (MATEP) If N is integer, it is the TABLED1 id. Integer N is not supported in new SOL700 E0 Not supported VP Only 0 is available EPS0 Only 1.0 is available

23 DEMATD translations of supported materials Main Index MATD77O Options Old New
MATD77O MATHE MODEL=Ogden1 RO RHO PR NU N Not supported NV Not supported G Not supported SIGF Not supported SGL Not supported SW Not supported ST Not supported TID1 Not supported DATA Not supported TID2 Not supported BSTART Not supported TRAMP Not supported MUi Mui ALPHAi ALPHAi Gi Not supported Betai Not supported
